author: .lanski
content: Hi guys! I'm trying to catch up on the SSV state of affairs - I understand that Blox will be leading the work and project management on the official spec and implementation with a target go-live timeline for Q1/Q2. Where could I find the official spec and is the current implementation repo public?

author: alon.ssv.network
content:
Hi! 
We are working on the official spec (could use all the help we can get)
The repo is this one: 

https://github.com/bloxapp/ssv
